description: Ziggy Banks finds himself extremely nervous for this next interview with all-star Marquee D'Angelo. He is intimidated by Marquee's perfect body and stunning presence all together--should he ask about the rumors of Marquee being gay?? When Marquee puts his hands on Ziggy to help him relax, they share a passionate kiss which leads to hardcore relentless fucking. Once their lust is unleashed sloppy blowjobs and plenty of ass worship leads to a deep pounding. Ziggy knows the truth now and is happy to keep it all to himself!
title: Interview with an All Star, Scene #01
